head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIROTA, IDA (NEE GANZ)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIROTA, IDA (NEE GANZ)

block.p: SIROTA-Ida (nee Ganz). On May 11, 2000, age 92 years. Beloved wife of the late Morris. Loving mother of Linda Brown (Stephen) and Dr. David King Sirota (Theodora). Cherished grandmother of Miriam Sirota, Eliot Cail-Sirota (Jessica), Allison Brown Kotin (Alan), and Jennifer Brown Simon (Neal). Adored great-grandmother of Zachary, Ryan and Jake. Caring teacher at P.S. 117 in Queens for many years. Service Sunday, 9:30AM, ''The Riverside'', 180 West 76th Street.
